Uses of Interface
com.igormaznitsa.prol.io.ProlTextReader

Packages that use ProlTextReader
com.igormaznitsa.prol.io The package contains classes to work with input-output streams from the engine. 
com.igormaznitsa.prol.logic The package contains classes which are used to process goals and logic of the engine. 
 

Uses of ProlTextReader in com.igormaznitsa.prol.io
 

Classes in com.igormaznitsa.prol.io that implement ProlTextReader
 class ProlMemoryPipe
          The class describes a memory pipe which is the object allows input-output operations in memory buffer.
 class ProlTextInputStream
          The class implements a text input stream which is used by a prol engine to read from an input stream.
 

Methods in com.igormaznitsa.prol.io that return ProlTextReader
 ProlTextReader ProlMemoryPipe.getReader()
          Get the reader for the pipe
